entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
